column2: We need to do something! Corona beer is helping the coronavirus spread!
column3: Ban the sale of Corona beer which will slow the spread of infection

column2: The company behind Corona beer is under investigation for releasing the virus as a marketing ploy

column2: People are stronger together so if we organise events with a lot of people the coronavirus will struggle to spread

column3: Investigate this claim

column2: We've found that the virus spreads through the water supply. You should take steps to mitigate this danger

column2: Hospitals are only infecting more people as people with the virus are here, they're not helping!
